messages.messageBody:
Group,

I have a sword with a type of tsuka i have not seen before. Can anyone tell me if this is indicative of a certain time period, usage, school etc. or it is just cheaply done?

http://www.auctionpix.com/jun6-8/jonemvc-015s.jpg

Thanks for the help


Mark Jones
